participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Friendly and adventurous, Alex enjoys engaging in conversations about hobbies and sports.
participant_1.background: i walk dogs for a living. i'm also a graduate student. i am an avid kayaker. i enjoy reading journals and guides related to psychology. my parents taught me survival skills.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and sociable, Jordan loves to share experiences and connect with fellow pet lovers.
participant_2.background: my family is continuously growing. i am married to a doctor. i live in a three storey house. i'm a professional tennis player. i enjoy long walks with my dog.

content.text: I am good thanks. How are you?
i am doing great   me and my cats are reading a book   well i am they listen
That sounds great! I don't have any cats but I enjoy long walks with my dog :)
i enjoy dogs as well   i take mine with me almost everywhere
What type of dogs do you have?
They really are! I have a French Bulldog, which I take everywhere with me when I'm at a tournament
lol that sounds great i would love to come by
Sure! I am in the French Open next week. I'll try and get you tickets :)
